original: nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dus gsum sangs rgyas la blta ba ni /
analyzed: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dus gsum sangs rgyas la blta ba ni /
translated: The view of the buddhas of the three times through the recitation of the names:游댷Light rays of five colors like a rainbow radiate from the vajra on the moon at the heart, filling the whole of space and illuminating everything.

original: snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rje las 'od zer kha dog lnga 'ja' tshon lta bu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa thams cad snang bas khyab pas gsal bar byas la blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mang la rgya che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa mdzad pa bcu gnyis mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rje las 'od zer kha dog lnga 'ja' tshon lta bu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa thams cad snang bas khyab pas gsal bar byas la blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mang la rgya che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa mdzad pa bcu gnyis mdzad pa dang /
translated: In the buddha realms of the vast and numerous world systems, the tath캐gatas perform the twelve deeds.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mnyam par gzhag pa dang / de las langs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bskor ba dang / 'khor rnam bzhis bskor ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la sems gtad la blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mnyam par gzhag pa dang / de las langs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bskor ba dang / 'khor rnam bzhis bskor ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la sems gtad la blta bar bya'o //
translated: The wheel of Dharma being turned, being in equipoise, rising from that, being turned by the bodhisattvas, being turned by the four retinues, the deeds and conduct of the tath캐gatas, and the bodhisattvas engaging in conduct.

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la blta ba rdzogs so//
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la blta ba rdzogs so//
translated: Looking at the buddhas of the three times is complete.
